topicSummary: Otitis externa is inflammation of the external ear canal and is classified as acute - lasting 3 weeks or less or chronic - lasting longerÂ than 3 months

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Otitis externa: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: New product availability - Cetraxal® (ciprofloxacin 2mg/ml ear drops solution in a single-dose container).

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in September 2016 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of the topic. Minor structural changes have been made.
